properties.name: nzMouseEnterDelay
properties.description: Delay in seconds, before tooltip is shown on mouse enter

properties.name: nzMouseLeaveDelay
properties.description: Delay in seconds, before tooltip is hidden on mouse leave

properties.name: nzOverlayClassName
properties.description: Class name of the tooltip card

properties.name: nzPlacement
properties.description: The position of the tooltip relative to the target, which can be one of `top` `left` `right` `bottom` `topLeft` `topRight` `bottomLeft` `bottomRight` `leftTop` `leftBottom` `rightTop` `rightBottom`

properties.name: nzVisible
properties.description: Whether the floating tooltip card is visible or not

properties.name: nzVisibleChange
properties.description: Callback executed when visibility of the tooltip card is changed

properties.name: nzTitle
properties.description: The text shown in the tooltip

title: Tooltip
description: A simple text popup tip.
whenToUse:
- The tip is shown on mouse enter, and is hidden on mouse leave. The Tooltip doesn't support complex text or operations.
- To provide an explanation of a `button/text/operation`. It's often used instead of the html `title` attribute.

properties.name: nzOffsetBottom
properties.description: Pixels to offset from bottom when calculating position of scroll

properties.name: nzOffsetTop
properties.description: Pixels to offset from top when calculating position of scroll

properties.name: nzTarget
properties.description: specifies the scrollable area dom node

properties.name: nzChange
properties.description: Callback for when affix state is changed

title: Affix
description: Make an element stick to viewport.
whenToUse: `When` user browses a long web page, some content need to stick to the viewport. This is common for menus and actions.

properties.name: nzOffsetBottom
properties.description: Pixels to offset from bottom when calculating position of scroll

properties.name: nzOffsetTop
properties.description: Pixels to offset from top when calculating position of scroll

properties.name: nzShowInkInFixed
properties.description: Whether show ink-balls in Fixed mode

properties.name: nzScroll
properties.description: The scroll function that is triggered when scrolling to an anchor.

title: Anchor
description: Hyperlinks to scroll on one page.
whenToUse: For displaying anchor hyperlinks on page and jumping between them.

title: Anchor
description: Hyperlinks to scroll on one page.
whenToUse: For displaying anchor hyperlinks on page and jumping between them.

properties.name: nzBackfill
properties.description: backfill selected item the input when using keyboard

properties.name: nzDefaultActiveFirstOption
properties.description: Whether active first option by default

properties.name: nzOverlayClassName
properties.description: Class name of the dropdown root element

properties.name: nzOverlayStyle
properties.description: Style of the dropdown root element

title: Autocomplete
description: Autocomplete function of input field.
whenToUse: When there is a need for autocomplete functionality.

properties.name: nzValue
properties.description: bind ngModel of the trigger element

properties.name: nzLabel
properties.description: display value of the trigger element

title: Autocomplete
description: Autocomplete function of input field.
whenToUse: When there is a need for autocomplete functionality.

properties.name: nzIcon
properties.description: the `Icon` type for an icon avatar, see `Icon`

properties.name: nzSrc
properties.description: the address of the image for an image avatar

title: Avatar
description: Avatars can be used to represent people or objects. It supports images, `Icon`s, or letters.

properties.name: nzVisibilityHeight
properties.description: the `nz-back-top` button will not show until the scroll height reaches this value

properties.name: nzTarget
properties.description: specifies the scrollable area dom node

properties.name: nzClick
properties.description: a callback function, which can be executed when you click the button

description:
The distance to the bottom is set to `50px` by default, which is overridable.
If you decide to use custom styles, please note the size limit: no more than `40px * 40px`.
title: BackTop
whenToUse:
- When the page content is very long.
- When you need to go back to the top very frequently in order to view the contents.

properties.name: nzDot
properties.description: Whether to display a red dot instead of `count`

properties.name: nzShowDot
properties.description: Whether to display the red dot

properties.name: nzShowZero
properties.description: Whether to show badge when `count` is zero

properties.name: nzText
properties.description: If `nzStatus` is set, `text` sets the display text of the status `dot`

title: Badge
description: Small numerical value or status descriptor for UI elements.
whenToUse: Badge normally appears in proximity to notifications or user avatars with eye-catching appeal, typically displaying unread messages count.

title: Breadcrumb
description: A breadcrumb displays the current location within a hierarchy. It allows going back to states higher up in the hierarchy.
whenToUse:
- When the system has more than two layers in a hierarchy.
- When you need to inform the user of where they are.
- When the user may need to navigate back to a higher level.
- When the application has multi-layer architecture.

properties.name: nzGhost
properties.description: make background transparent and invert text and border colors

properties.name: nzLoading
properties.description: set the loading status of button

properties.name: nzShape
properties.description: can be set to `circle` or omitted

properties.name: nzSize
properties.description: can be set to `small` `large` or omitted

properties.name: nzType
properties.description: can be set to `primary` `ghost` `dashed` `danger` or omitted (meaning `default`)

properties.name: nzBlock
properties.description: option to fit button width to its parent width

description: To get a customized button, just set `nzType`/`nzShape`/`nzSize`/`nzLoading`/`disabled`.
title: Button
whenToUse: A button means an operation (or a series of operations). Clicking a button will trigger corresponding business logic.

properties.name: nzMode
properties.description: The display mode of the calendar (two-way bindable)

properties.name: nzCard
properties.description: Whether to not display in full-screen

properties.name: nzDateCell
properties.description: (Contentable) Customize the display of the date cell, the template content will be appended to the cell

properties.name: nzDateFullCell
properties.description: (Contentable) Customize the display of the date cell, the template content will override the cell

properties.name: nzMonthCell
properties.description: (Contentable) Customize the display of the month cell, the template content will be appended to the cell

properties.name: nzMonthFullCell
properties.description: (Contentable) Customize the display of the month cell, the template content will override the cell

title: Calendar
description: Container for displaying data in calendar form.
whenToUse: When data is in the form of dates, such as schedules, timetables, prices calendar, lunar calendar. This component also supports Year/Month switch.

properties.name: nzActions
properties.description: The action list, shows at the bottom of the Card.

properties.name: nzBodyStyle
properties.description: Inline style to apply to the card content

properties.name: nzBordered
properties.description: Toggles rendering of the border around the card

properties.name: nzExtra
properties.description: Content to render in the top-right corner of the card

properties.name: nzLoading
properties.description: Shows a loading indicator while the contents of the card are being fetched

properties.name: nzType
properties.description: Card style type, can be set to `inner` or not set

title: Card
description: Simple rectangular container.
whenToUse: A card can be used to display content related to a single subject. The content can consist of multiple elements of varying types and sizes.

title: Card
description: Simple rectangular container.
whenToUse: A card can be used to display content related to a single subject. The content can consist of multiple elements of varying types and sizes.

description: Area for grid style card
title: Card
whenToUse: A card can be used to display content related to a single subject. The content can consist of multiple elements of varying types and sizes.

description: Area for tab card
title: Card
whenToUse: A card can be used to display content related to a single subject. The content can consist of multiple elements of varying types and sizes.

properties.name: nzAutoPlaySpeed
properties.description: Duration (milliseconds), does not scroll when set to 0

properties.name: nzDots
properties.description: Whether to show the dots at the bottom of the gallery

properties.name: nzVertical
properties.description: Whether to use a vertical display

properties.name: nzAfterChange
properties.description: Callback function called after the current index changes

properties.name: nzBeforeChange
properties.description: Callback function called before the current index changes

properties.name: nzEnableSwipe
properties.description: Whether to support swipe gesture (would work if only you import hammer.js in your project)

title: Carousel
description: A carousel component. Scales with its container.
whenToUse:
- When there is a group of content on the same level.
- When there is insufficient content space, it can be used to save space in the form of a revolving door.
- Commonly used for a group of pictures/cards.

properties.name: nzAutoFocus
properties.description: whether auto focus the input box

properties.name: nzChangeOn
properties.description: change value on each selection if this function return `true`

properties.name: nzChangeOnSelect
properties.description: change value on each selection if set to true, see above demo for details

properties.name: nzColumnClassName
properties.description: additional className of column in the popup overlay

properties.name: nzExpandTrigger
properties.description: expand current item when click or hover, one of 'click' 'hover'

properties.name: nzMenuStyle
properties.description: additional css style of popup overlay

properties.name: nzNotFoundContent
properties.description: Specify content to show when no result matches.

properties.name: nzLabelProperty
properties.description: the label property name of options

properties.name: nzLabelRender
properties.description: render template of displaying selected options

properties.name: nzLoadData
properties.description: To load option lazily. If setting `ngModel` with an array value and `nzOptions` is not setting, lazy load will be call immediately

properties.name: nzShowSearch
properties.description: Whether support search. Cannot be used with `[nzLoadData]` at the same time

properties.name: nzValueProperty
properties.description: the value property name of options

properties.name: nzVisibleChange
properties.description: Emit on popup menu visible or hide

title: Cascader
description: Cascade selection box.
whenToUse:
- When you need to select from a set of associated data set. Such as province/city/district, company level, things classification.
- When selecting from a large data set, with multi-stage classification separated for easy selection.
- Chooses cascade items in one float layer for better user experience.

properties.name: ngModel
properties.description: Specifies whether the checkbox is selected, double binding

properties.name: nzIndeterminate
properties.description: set the status of indeterminate，only affect the style

properties.name: ngModelChange
properties.description: The callback function that is triggered when the state changes.

title: Checkbox
description: Checkbox.
whenToUse:
- Used for selecting multiple values from several options.
- If you use only one checkbox, it is the same as using Switch to toggle between two states. The difference is that Switch will trigger the state change directly, but Checkbox just marks the state as changed and this needs to be submitted.

properties.name: ngModel
properties.typeRaw: Array<{ label: string; value: string; checked?: boolean; }>

properties.name: ngModelChange
properties.description: The callback function that is triggered when the state changes.
properties.typeRaw: EventEmitter<Array<{ label: string; value: string; checked?: boolean; }>>

title: Checkbox
description: Checkbox.
whenToUse:
- Used for selecting multiple values from several options.
- If you use only one checkbox, it is the same as using Switch to toggle between two states. The difference is that Switch will trigger the state change directly, but Checkbox just marks the state as changed and this needs to be submitted.

properties.name: nzOnChange
properties.description: The callback function that is triggered when the state changes.

title: Checkbox
description: Checkbox.
whenToUse:
- Used for selecting multiple values from several options.
- If you use only one checkbox, it is the same as using Switch to toggle between two states. The difference is that Switch will trigger the state change directly, but Checkbox just marks the state as changed and this needs to be submitted.

title: Collapse
description: A content area which can be collapsed and expanded.
whenToUse:
- Can be used to group or hide complex regions to keep the page clean.
- `Accordion` is a special kind of `Collapse`, which allows only one panel to be expanded at a time.

properties.name: nzDisabled
properties.description: If `true`, panel cannot be opened or closed

properties.name: nzActive
properties.description: Active status of panel, double binding

properties.name: nzActiveChange
properties.description: Callback function of the active status

title: Collapse
description: A content area which can be collapsed and expanded.
whenToUse:
- Can be used to group or hide complex regions to keep the page clean.
- `Accordion` is a special kind of `Collapse`, which allows only one panel to be expanded at a time.

title: Divider
description: A divider line separates different content.
whenToUse:
- Divide sections of article.
- Divide inline text and links such as the operation column of table.

properties.name: nzClosable
properties.description: Whether a close (x) button is visible on top right of the Drawer dialog or not.

properties.name: nzMask
properties.description: Whether to show mask or not.

properties.name: nzMaskClosable
properties.description: Clicking on the mask (area outside the Drawer) to close the Drawer or not.

properties.name: nzBodyStyle
properties.description: Body style for drawer body element. Such as height, padding etc.

properties.name: nzVisible
properties.description: Whether the Drawer dialog is visible or not.

properties.name: nzWidth
properties.description: Width of the Drawer dialog, only when placement is `'right'` or `'left'`.

properties.name: nzHeight
properties.description: Height of the Drawer dialog, only when placement is `'top'` or `'bottom'`.

properties.name: nzOffsetX
properties.description: The the X coordinate offset(px), only when placement is `'right'` or `'left'`.

properties.name: nzOffsetY
properties.description: The the Y coordinate offset(px), only when placement is `'top'` or `'bottom'`.

properties.name: nzWrapClassName
properties.description: The class name of the container of the Drawer dialog.

properties.name: nzOnClose
properties.description: Specify a callback that will be called when a user clicks mask, close button or Cancel button.

title: Drawer
description: A Drawer is a panel that is typically overlaid on top of a page and slides in from the side. It contains a set of information or actions. Since that user can interact with the Drawer without leaving the current page, tasks can be achieved more efficient within the same context.
whenToUse:
- Use a Form to create or edit a set of information.
- Processing subtasks. When subtasks are too heavy for Popover and we still want to keep the subtasks in the context of the main task, Drawer comes very handy.
- When a same Form is needed in multiple places.

properties.name: nzDisabled

description: Used to separate the item in forms, contains label(optional) and control field.
title: Form

properties.name: nzRequired
properties.description: add required style to current item

description: The label of the form item, optional.
title: Form

properties.name: nzValidateStatus
properties.description: Will generate status based on FormControl

properties.name: nzHasFeedback
properties.description: Used with `nzValidateStatus`, this option specifies the validation status icon. Recommended to be used only with `Input`.

description: Note：Due to the lack of partial Observable in [Angular Form](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues/10887), you have to notify `nz-form-control` to update its status with `updateValueAndValidity` when you update form status using methods like `markAsDirty`.
title: Form

description: Validation messages
title: Form

description: The extra prompt message. It is similar to help.
title: Form

description: The split icon of `-`
title: Form

description: Text in `nz-form-control`
title: Form

properties.name: nzAlign
properties.description: the vertical alignment of the flex layout: `top` `middle` `bottom`

properties.name: nzGutter
properties.description: spacing between grids, could be a number or a object like `{ xs: 8, sm: 16, md: 24, lg: 32, xl: 32, xxl: 32 }`

properties.name: nzJustify
properties.description: horizontal arrangement of the flex layout: `start` `end` `center` `space-around` `space-between`

title: Grid
description: 24 Grids System。

properties.name: nzOffset
properties.description: the number of cells to offset Col from the left

properties.name: nzOrder
properties.description: raster order, used in `flex` layout mode

properties.name: nzPull
properties.description: the number of cells that raster is moved to the left

properties.name: nzPush
properties.description: the number of cells that raster is moved to the right

properties.name: nzSpan
properties.description: raster number of cells to occupy, 0 corresponds to `display: none`

properties.name: nzXs
properties.description: `<576px` and also default setting, could be a `span` value or an object containing above props

properties.name: nzSm
properties.description: `≥576px`, could be a `span` value or an object containing above props

properties.name: nzMd
properties.description: `≥768px`, could be a `span` value or an object containing above props

properties.name: nzLg
properties.description: `≥992px`, could be a `span` value or an object containing above props

properties.name: nzXl
properties.description: `≥1200px`, could be a `span` value or an object containing above props

properties.name: nzXXl
properties.description: `≥1600px`, could be a `span` value or an object containing above props

title: Grid
description: 24 Grids System。

properties.name: nzSize
properties.description: The size of the input box. Note: in the context of a form, the `large` size is used. Available: `large` `default` `small`

properties.name: nzAutosize
properties.description: Only used for `textarea`, height autosize feature, can be set to `boolean` or an object `{ minRows: 2, maxRows: 6 }`

description: All props of input supported by [w3c standards](https://www.w3schools.com/tags/tag_input.asp) and Angular can used in `nz-input`.
title: Input
whenToUse:
- A user input in a form field is needed.
- A search input is required.

properties.name: nzAddonAfter
properties.description: The label text displayed after (on the right side of) the input field.

properties.name: nzAddonBefore
properties.description: The label text displayed before (on the left side of) the input field.

properties.name: nzPrefix
properties.description: The prefix icon for the Input.

properties.name: nzSuffix
properties.description: The suffix icon for the Input.

properties.name: nzSize
properties.description: The size of `nz-input-group` specifies the size of the included `nz-input` fields. Available: `large` `default` `small`

title: Input
description:
A basic widget for getting the user input is a text field.
Keyboard and mouse can be used for providing or changing data.
whenToUse:
- A user input in a form field is needed.
- A search input is required.

properties.name: nzFormatter
properties.description: Specifies the format of the value presented

properties.name: nzParser
properties.description: Specifies the value extracted from nzFormatter

properties.name: nzStep
properties.description: The number to which the current value is increased or decreased. It can be an integer or decimal.

properties.name: ngModelChange
properties.description: The callback triggered when the value is changed

title: InputNumber
description: Enter a number within certain range with the mouse or keyboard.
whenToUse: When a numeric value needs to be provided.

properties.name: nzGrid

properties.name: nzItemLayout

properties.name: nzLoading

properties.name: nzSplit

title: List
description: Simple List.

properties.name: nzExtra
properties.description: The extra content of list item. If `itemLayout` is `vertical`, shows the content on right, otherwise shows content on the far right.

title: List
description: Simple List.
whenToUse: A list can be used to display content related to a single subject. The content can consist of multiple elements of varying type and size.

Top navigation provides all the category and functions of the website. Side navigation provides the Multi-level structure of the website.

properties.name: nzSelected

whenToUse:

- If you want to browse the data by navigating through pages.

properties.name: nzMouseEnterDelay

properties.description: Delay in seconds, before tooltip is hidden on mouse leave

properties.name: nzPlacement
properties.description: The position of the tooltip relative to the target, which can be one of `top` `left` `right` `bottom` `topLeft` `topRight` `bottomLeft` `bottomRight` `leftTop` `leftBottom` `rightTop` `rightBottom`

properties.name: nzVisible

properties.name: nzTitle

properties.name: nzCondition
properties.description: Whether to directly emit `onConfirm` without showing Popconfirm

title: Popconfirm

whenToUse: A simple and compact dialog used for asking for user confirmation.

properties.name: nzGapDegree

properties.name: nzShowInfo

properties.name: nzStatus

properties.name: nzStrokeWidth
properties.description: to set the width of the progress bar, unit: `px`

properties.name: nzStrokeWidth
properties.description: to set the width of the circular progress bar, unit: percentage of the canvas width

properties.name: nzStrokeLinecap
properties.description: to set the style of the progress linecap

title: Progress

whenToUse:

- The difference between Select is that Radio is visible to user and can facilitate the comparison of choice. So, when you want to use Radio, option should not be too much.

title: Select
description: Select component to select value from options.
whenToUse:
- A dropdown menu for displaying choices - an elegant alternative to the native `<select>` element.
- Utilizing [Radio](/components/radio/en) is recommended when there are fewer total options (less than 5).

properties.name: nzLabel
properties.description: The text show in nz-select and dropdown menu

properties.name: nzValue
properties.description: The value passed to ngModel of nz-select

properties.name: nzCustomContent
properties.description: Whether custom nz-option content in drodown menu, the ng-content in nz-option will relace nzLabel when it was set to true

title: Select
description: Select component to select value from options.
whenToUse:
- A dropdown menu for displaying choices - an elegant alternative to the native `<select>` element.
- Utilizing [Radio](/components/radio/en) is recommended when there are fewer total options (less than 5).

title: Select
description: Select component to select value from options.
whenToUse:
- A dropdown menu for displaying choices - an elegant alternative to the native `<select>` element.
- Utilizing [Radio](/components/radio/en) is recommended when there are fewer total options (less than 5).

title: Skeleton
description: Provide a placeholder at the place which need waiting for loading.
whenToUse:
- When resource need long time loading, like low network speed.
- The component contains much information, such as List or Card.

properties.name: nzDefaultValue
properties.description: The default value of slider. When `range` is `false`, use `number`, otherwise, use `[number, number]`

properties.name: nzDisabled
properties.description: If true, the slider will not be interactable.

properties.name: nzDots
properties.description: Whether the thumb can drag over tick only.

properties.name: nzIncluded
properties.description: Make effect when `marks` not null，`true` means containment and `false` means coordinative

properties.name: nzMarks
properties.description: Tick mark of Slider, type of key must be `number`, and must in closed interval [min, max] ，each mark can declare its own style.
properties.default: { number: string/HTML } or { number: { style: object, label: string/HTML } }

properties.name: nzMax
properties.description: The maximum value the slider can slide to

properties.name: nzMin
properties.description: The minimum value the slider can slide to.

properties.name: nzStep
properties.description: The granularity the slider can step through values. Must greater than 0, and be divided by (max - min) . When  `marks` no null, `step` can be `null`.

properties.name: nzTipFormatter
properties.description: Slider will pass its value to `tipFormatter`, and display its value in Tooltip, and hide Tooltip when return value is null.

properties.name: ngModel
properties.description: The value of slider. When `range` is `false`, use `number`, otherwise, use `[number, number]`

properties.name: nzVertical
properties.description: If true, the slider will be vertical.

properties.name: ngModelChange
properties.description: Callback function that is fired when the user changes the slider's value.

title: Slider
description: A Slider component for displaying current value and intervals in range.
whenToUse: To input a value in a range.

properties.name: nzDelay
properties.description: specifies a delay in milliseconds for loading state (prevent flush)

properties.name: nzIndicator
properties.description: React node of the spinning indicator

properties.name: nzTip
properties.description: customize description content when Spin has children

title: Spin
description: A spinner for displaying loading state of a page or a section.
whenToUse: When part of the page is waiting for asynchronous data or during a rendering process, an appropriate loading animation can effectively alleviate users' inquietude.

properties.name: nzCurrent
properties.description: To set the current step, counting from 0. You can overwrite this state by using `nzStatus` of `nz-step`

properties.name: nzDirection
properties.description: To specify the direction of the step bar, `horizontal` and `vertical` are currently supported

properties.name: nzProgressDot
properties.description: Steps with progress dot style, customize the progress dot by setting it with TemplateRef
properties.typeRaw: Boolean | `TemplateRef<{ $implicit: TemplateRef<void>, status: string, index: number }>`

properties.name: nzSize
properties.description: To specify the size of the step bar, `default` and `small` are currently supported

properties.name: nzStatus
properties.description: To specify the status of current step, can be set to one of the following values: `wait` `process` `finish` `error`

description: The whole of the step bar.
title: Steps
whenToUse: When the task is complicated or has a certain sequence in the series of subtasks, we can decompose it into several steps to make things easier.

properties.name: nzDescription
properties.description: description of the step, optional property

properties.name: nzIcon
properties.description: icon of the step, optional property

properties.name: nzStatus
properties.description: to specify the status. It will be automatically set by `nzCurrent` of `nz-steps` if not configured. Optional values are: `wait` `process` `finish` `error`

description: A single step in the step bar.
title: Steps
whenToUse: When the task is complicated or has a certain sequence in the series of subtasks, we can decompose it into several steps to make things easier.

title: Switch
description: Switching Selector.
whenToUse:
- If you need to represent the switching between two states or on-off state.
- The difference between `Switch` and `Checkbox` is that `Switch` will trigger a state change directly when you toggle it, while `Checkbox` is generally used for state marking, which should work in conjunction with submit operation.

properties.name: nzData
properties.description: Data record array to be displayed

properties.name: nzFrontPagination
properties.description: Whether paginate data in front side，should set to `false` if you want to paginate data in server side or display all data in table

properties.description: Whether to hide pager on single page

properties.name: nzOperations

properties.name: nzShowExpand

properties.name: nzShowIcon

properties.name: nzDraggable

properties.description: Check treeNode precisely; parent treeNode and children treeNodes are not associated

properties.name: nzSelectedKeys

properties.name: nzClick

properties.name: nzDblClick
properties.description: Callback function for when the user double clicks a treeNode

properties.name: nzContextMenu
properties.description: Callback function for when the user right clicks a treeNode

properties.name: nzCheckBoxChange
properties.description: Callback function for when user clicks the Checkbox

properties.name: nzExpandChange

properties.name: nzSearchValueChange

properties.name: nzOnDragStart
properties.description: Callback function for when the onDragStart event occurs

properties.name: nzOnDragEnter
properties.description: Callback function for when the onDragEnter event occurs

properties.name: nzOnDragOver
properties.description: Callback function for when the onDragOver event occurs

properties.name: nzOnDragLeave
properties.description: Callback function for when the onDragLeave event occurs

properties.name: nzOnDrop
properties.description: Callback function for when the onDrop event occurs

properties.name: nzOnDragEnd
properties.description: Callback function for when the onDragEnd event occurs

title: Tree
description: When To Use
whenToUse: Almost anything can be represented in a tree structure. Examples include directories, organization hierarchies, biological classifications, countries, etc. The `Tree` component is a way of representing the hierarchical relationship between these things. You can also  expand, collapse, and select a treeNode within a `Tree`.

properties.name: nzShowSearch
properties.description: Whether to display a search input in the dropdown menu(valid only in the single mode)

properties.name: nzDropdownMatchSelectWidth
properties.description: Determine whether the dropdown menu and the select input are the same width

properties.name: nzDropdownStyle
properties.description: To set the style of the dropdown menu

properties.name: nzMultiple
properties.description: Support multiple or not, will be `true` when enable `nzCheckable`.

properties.name: nzSize
properties.description: To set the size of the select input, options: `large` `small`

properties.name: nzCheckable
properties.description: Whether to show checkbox on the treeNodes

properties.name: nzShowExpand
properties.description: Show a Expand Icon before the treeNodes

properties.name: nzAsyncData
properties.description: Load data asynchronously (should be used with NzTreeNode.addChildren(...))

properties.name: nzDefaultExpandAll
properties.description: Whether to expand all treeNodes by default

properties.name: nzDisplayWith
properties.description: How to display the selected node value in the trigger

properties.name: nzExpandChange
properties.description: Callback function for when a treeNode is expanded or collapsed

title: TreeSelect
description: Tree selection control.
whenToUse:
`TreeSelect` is similar to `Select`, but the values are provided in a tree like structure.
Any data whose entries are defined in a hierarchical manner is fit to use this control. Examples of such case may include a corporate hierarchy, a directory structure, and so on.

properties.name: nzAccept
properties.description: File types that can be accepted. See [input accept Attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input#attr-accept)

properties.name: nzBeforeUpload
properties.description: Hook function which will be executed before uploading. Uploading will be stopped with `false` or a Observable. **Warning：this function is not supported in IE9**. NOTICE: Muse be use `=>` to define the method.

properties.name: nzCustomRequest
properties.description: override for the default xhr behavior allowing for additional customization and ability to implement your own XMLHttpRequest. NOTICE: Muse be use `=>` to define the method.

properties.name: nzData
properties.description: Uploading params or function which can return uploading params. NOTICE: Muse be use `=>` to define the method.

properties.name: nzLimit
properties.description: limit single upload count when `nzMultiple` has opened. `0` unlimited

properties.name: nzHeaders
properties.description: Set request headers, valid above IE10. NOTICE: Muse be use `=>` to define the method.

properties.name: nzListType
properties.description: Built-in stylesheets, support for three types: `text`, `picture` or `picture-card`

properties.name: nzMultiple
properties.description: Whether to support selected multiple file. `IE10+` supported. You can select multiple files with CTRL holding down while multiple is set to be true

properties.name: nzShowUploadList
properties.description: Whether to show default upload list, could be an object to specify `showPreviewIcon` and `showRemoveIcon` individually
properties.typeRaw: Boolean or { showPreviewIcon?: boolean, showRemoveIcon?: boolean }

properties.name: nzPreview
properties.description: A callback function, will be executed when file link or preview icon is clicked. NOTICE: Muse be use `=>` to define the method.

properties.name: nzRemove
properties.description: A callback function, will be executed when removing file button is clicked, remove event will be prevented when return value is `false` or a Observable. NOTICE: Muse be use `=>` to define the method.

properties.name: nzChange
properties.description: A callback function, can be executed when uploading state is changing

title: Upload
description: Upload file by selecting or dragging.
whenToUse: Uploading is the process of publishing information (web pages, text, pictures, video, etc.) to a remote server via a web page or upload tool.

title: AvatarList
description: A list of user's avatar for project or group member list frequently. If a large or small avatar-list is desired, set the `size` property to either `large` or `small` and `mini` respectively. Omit the `size` property for a avatar-list with the default size.

properties.name: src
properties.description: the address of the image for an image avatar

title: AvatarList
description: A list of user's avatar for project or group member list frequently. If a large or small avatar-list is desired, set the `size` property to either `large` or `small` and `mini` respectively. Omit the `size` property for a avatar-list with the default size.

properties.name: notify
properties.description: 通知时触发，需要在 `config` 中配置 notify

title: 倒计时
description: 倒计时组件，依赖 [ngx-countdown](https://github.com/cipchk/ngx-countdown)。

properties.name: ngModel
properties.description: Start date, start and end values at the same time

properties.name: ngModelEnd
properties.description: End date, start and end values at the same time

title: Data Range
description: Based on the `nz-range-picker` further optimization, better service to start and end dates.

title: Download file
description: A file download based on `blob`.

title: Edit
description: A higher-order components of the form HTML template. And optimized some details:

Property | Description | Type | Default
----|------|-----
`[col]` | specify the maximum number of columns to display, the final columns number is determined by col setting combined with [Responsive Rules](/theme/responsive) | `1,2,3,4,5,6` | -
`[label]` | Label | `string,TemplateRef<void>` | -
`[optional]` | Label optional information | `string` | -
`[optionalHelp]` | Label optional help | `string` | -
`[error]` | validation error message | `string` | -
`[extra]` | The extra prompt message. It is similar to help. | `string` | -
`[required]` | whether required identifier | `string` | -
`[line]` | whether separation line style | `boolean` | -
`[controlClass]` | Control area classes | `string` | -
`[id]` | Custom `id` value of component | `string` | -
title: Edit

description: Display title.

properties.name: lines
properties.description: 在按照行数截取下最大的行数，超过则截取省略

title: 文本自动省略号
description: 一个简单的文本自动省略号。

title: Error Collect
description: A simple form exception messages collector that jump to element location via click icon; it must be a standard `form`.

title: Error Collect
description: A simple form exception messages collector that jump to element location via click icon; it must be a standard `form`.

properties.name: type
properties.description: type of exception, the corresponding default `title`, `desc`, `img` will be given if set, which can be overridden by explicit setting of `title`, `desc`, `img`

title: Exception
description: Exceptions page is used to provide feedback on specific abnormal state. Usually, it contains an explanation of the error status, and provides users with suggestions or operations, to prevent users from feeling lost and confused.

properties.name: errorCollect
properties.description: Whether `error-collect`, make sure to wrap inside the `<form>` element

properties.name: extra
properties.description: extra information, align to the left

title: FooterToolbar
description: A toolbar fixed at the bottom.

properties.name: fullscreen
properties.description: Whether full screen (not including top, sidebar area)

title: Full Screen Workspace
description: Often used for tables with scroll bars, a simple [demo](https://ng-alain.github.io/ng-alain/#/delon/simple-table)。
Switch whether it is full screen.

通知菜单
description: 用在导航工具栏上，作为整个产品统一的通知中心。

properties.name: autoTitle
properties.description: 自动生成标题，以当前路由从主菜单中定位

properties.name: syncTitle
properties.description: 是否自动将标题同步至 `TitleService`、`ReuseService` 下，仅 `title` 为 `string` 类型时有效

properties.name: home
properties.description: 首页文本，若指定空表示不显示

properties.name: autoBreadcrumb
properties.description: 自动生成导航，以当前路由从主菜单中定位

properties.name: recursiveBreadcrumb
properties.description: 自动向上递归查找，菜单数据源包含 `/ware`，则 `/ware/1` 也视为 `/ware` 项

title: 页头
description: 页头用来声明页面的主题，包含了用户所关注的最重要的信息，使用户可以快速理解当前页面是什么以及它的功能。

properties.name: value
properties.description: Value encoded within the QR code

properties.name: background
properties.description: Background colour of the QR code

properties.name: backgroundAlpha
properties.description: Background alpha of the QR code

properties.name: foreground
properties.description: Foreground colour of the QR code

properties.name: foregroundAlpha
properties.description: Foreground alpha of the QR code

properties.name: level
properties.description: Error correction level of the QR code

properties.name: mime
properties.description: MIME type used to render the image for the QR code

title: QR
description: Generate a QR code based on [qrious](https://neocotic.com/qrious).

title: 快速菜单
description: 快速菜单，用于右侧隐式辅助列表。

properties.name: type
properties.description: 类型，不同类型自带对应的图标

properties.name: extra
properties.description: 补充信息，有默认的灰色背景

title: 处理结果
description: 结果页用于对用户进行的一系列任务处理结果进行反馈。

title: Reuse Route Tab
description: Reuse route tab are extremely common for admin interfaces, and the problem of component data is not lost when switching routes.

properties.name: disabledAcl
properties.description: `acl` 校验失败时以 `disabled` 状态显示

properties.name: autoCloseUnderPad
properties.description: 小于Pad宽度时路由切换后自动关闭侧边栏

title: 主菜单
description: ng-alain 左边主菜单，依赖于 `@delon/theme`。

properties.name: ps
properties.description: Page size, `0` is no page, default is `10`

properties.name: bordered
properties.description: Whether to show all table borders

properties.name: loadingDelay
properties.description: Specifies a delay in milliseconds for loading state (prevent flush)

properties.name: scroll
properties.description: Whether table can be scrolled in x/y direction, x or y can be a string that indicates the width and height of table body

properties.name: singleSort
properties.description:
Single sort config
If not specified, return: `columnName=ascend|descend`
If specified, return: `sort=columnName.(ascend|descend)`

properties.name: multiSort
properties.description: Whether to mulit-sort, recommended use in URL data source

properties.name: rowClickTime
properties.description: Click twice in the time range for double click, unit is millisecond

properties.name: body
properties.description: Table extra body renderer, generally used to add total rows

properties.name: expandRowByClick
properties.description: Whether to expand row by clicking anywhere in the whole row

properties.name: expand
properties.description: Whether current column include expand icon

title: Table
description: `st` is not creating another table component, but use **configurable** rendering table on base of `nz-table`. this method can satisfy most scenes in admin interfaces, but it's easier to rendering table.

properties.name: change
properties.description: 展开与收进回调函数，参数：`boolean`

title: 标签选择器
description: 增加标签的展开与收进功能。

properties.description: specify the distance between two items, unit is `px`

properties.name: col
properties.description: specify the maximum number of columns to display, the final columns number is determined by col setting combined with [Responsive Rules](/theme/responsive)

title: View
description: Viewing grid system is a higher-order components based on the original [Grid System] (https://ng.ant.design/components/grid/zh) that server for view pages.

properties.name: gutter
properties.description: specify the distance between two items, unit is `px`

properties.name: col
properties.description: specify the maximum number of columns to display, the final columns number is determined by col setting combined with [Responsive Rules](/theme/responsive)

title: View
description: Viewing grid system is a higher-order components based on the original [Grid System] (https://ng.ant.design/components/grid/zh) that server for view pages.

| Property       | Description                           | Type             | Default |
| -------------- | ------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------- |
| `[col]`        | specify the maximum number of columns to display, the final columns number is determined by col setting combined with [Responsive Rules](/theme/responsive) | - |
| `[label]`      | label of view                                  | `string,TemplateRef<void>`            | - |
| `[labelWidth]` | label text of width, inherit `sv-container`     | `number`                               | - |
| `[default]`    | whether default text, inherit `sv-container` | `boolean`                              | - |
| `[type]`       | type of view                  | `primary | success | danger | warning` | - |
title: View

description: Display title.
title: View

description: Display title.
title: View

description: xlsx directive.
title: Excel

properties.name: autoLabel
properties.description: 在宽度不足时，自动隐藏 x 轴的 label

title: 柱状图
description: 使用垂直的柱子显示类别之间的数值比较。其中一个轴表示需要对比的分类维度，另一个轴代表相应的数值。

title: 图表卡片
description: 图表卡片，用于展示图表的卡片容器，可以方便的配合其它图表套件展示丰富信息。

title: Custom Chart
description: Use `g2-custom` component to package your G2 chart.

title: 仪表盘
description: 一种进度展示方式，可以更直观的展示当前的进展情况，通常也可表示占比。

properties.name: yTooltipSuffix
properties.description: y 轴Tooltip后缀，一般指定单位

title: 迷你区域图
description: 面积图又叫区域图。 它是在折线图的基础之上形成的, 它将折线图中折线与自变量坐标轴之间的区域使用颜色或者纹理填充，这样一个填充区域我们叫做面积，颜色的填充可以更好的突出趋势信息。

properties.name: yTooltipSuffix
properties.description: y 轴Tooltip后缀，一般指定单位

title: 迷你柱状图
description: 迷你柱状图更适合展示简单的区间数据，简洁的表现方式可以很好的减少大数据量的视觉展现压力。

title: 迷你进度条
description: 用于显示跟速度相关图形再适合不过。

properties.name: gap
properties.description: set the spacing (pixels) between numbers and descriptions

title: NumberInfo
description: Often used in data cards for highlighting the business data.

title: 饼状图
description: 用于显示跟速度相关图形再适合不过。

title: 雷达图
description: 雷达图是以相同点开始的轴上表示的三个或更多个定量变量的二维图形的形式显示多变量数据的图形方法。轴的相对位置和角度通常是不知情的。

properties.name: min
properties.description: 最大值，若小于0表示显示负值

title: 单一柱状图
description: 单一柱状图更适合在列表中展示简单的区间数据，简洁的表现方式可以很好的减少大数据量的视觉展现压力。

title: 标签云
description: 标签云是一套相关的标签以及与此相应的权重展示方式，一般典型的标签云有 30 至 150 个标签，而权重影响使用的字体大小或其他视觉效果。

title: 折线图
description: 使用 `timeline` 组件可以实现带有时间轴的柱状图展现，而其中的 `x` 属性，则是时间值的指向，默认最多支持同时展现两个指标，分别是 `y1` 和 `y2`。

title: 趋势标记
description: 趋势符号，标记上升和下降趋势。通常用绿色代表“好”，红色代表“不好”，股票涨跌场景除外。

title: 水波图
description: 水波图是一种比例的展示方式，可以更直观的展示关键值的占比。

properties.name: firstVisual
properties.description: Whether to show visual error immediately

title: Getting Started
description: @delon/form is a dynamic build form based on the [JSON Schema](http://json-schema.org/) standard.

properties.name: firstVisual
properties.description: Whether to show visual error immediately

title: Getting Started
description: @delon/form is a dynamic build form based on the [JSON Schema](http://json-schema.org/) standard.
